summary: Comprehensive testing of QuissMe app completed. All backend APIs (10/10) and frontend flows (9/9) passed successfully. Core features working: user registration with astro calculation, invite/join flow, quiz system with 5 love language quizzes, result calculation with normalized scoring.

minor.issue: BAFE astrology API returns 401 (expected), fallback zodiac calculation working correctly

react_native_issues.issue: Console warnings: 'useNativeDriver not supported', 'shadow* props deprecated', 'pointerEvents deprecated' - These are expected React Native Web limitations, not blocking

critical_code_review_comments: ✓ MongoDB _id properly excluded from all API responses using serialize_doc()
✓ All interactive elements have testID attributes for testing
✓ Environment variables properly used (EXPO_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL, MONGO_URL, etc.)
✓ React Native components used correctly (View, Text, TouchableOpacity)
✓ Error handling in place for API calls
✓ Night Mode and Dusk Mode themes properly implemented
✓ Glassmorphism UI with BlurView components working
Minor: Repetitive zodiac calculation logic in server.py (lines 162-203) could be refactored but functional
seed_data_creation: Quiz data auto-seeded on backend startup from love_languages_cluster.json (5 quizzes with 10 questions each). Test users created during API tests with TEST_ prefix.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend API fully functional with proper fallback for BAFE astrology API. Frontend UI renders correctly in mobile viewport. Quiz flow tested end-to-end with result calculation verified.

frontend_tests_passed: Splash screen renders with QuissMe branding
Onboarding form: name, birth date (1995-06-15), time (14:30), location (Berlin) filled and submitted
Result screen shows Zwillinge zodiac (correct for June 15)
Quiz flow: 10 questions with 4 options each, progress bar, auto-advance working
Quiz result displays primary cluster (Lob & Anerkennung), normalized bars, next quiz button
Waiting room screen loads with animation
